meta.title: VibeCap — Boost Your Vibe Coding
meta.description: A screenshot tool built specifically for vibe coding. Capture, annotate, and send to your editor in one flow.

hero.headline: Boost your vibe coding
hero.subheadline: by fixing the way you take screenshots

problems.title: Why screenshots slow you down today
problems.subtitle: macOS screenshots are powerful. But once you start vibe coding, they become friction.

items.title: The screenshot disappears before you're ready
items.description: You take a screenshot. If you don't grab it immediately and drop it into the input box in time, it's gone. Now you're digging through folders. That moment of flow is already broken.

items.title: Moving screenshots across windows is fragile
items.description: Even if you catch the screenshot, you still have to drag it across screens, find the right window, aim for the right input box. Miss once, and you're retrying.

items.title: Multiple screenshots mean repeated pain
items.description: Need to send two or three screenshots together? You repeat the same steps again and again: capture → grab → drag → drop. It's slow. And it pulls you out of your thinking every time.

items.title: Annotation exists, but doesn't help much
items.description: macOS annotation tools technically work. But they're not designed for explaining problems to an editor: switching tools, clicking tiny buttons, marking without context.

solution.title: What VibeCap changes
solution.subtitle: VibeCap is not a replacement for your editor. It fixes the moment before you talk to it.

flow.step4: Send everything to your editor — once

benefits: No repeating the same action three times

workflow.title: Built for vibe coding workflows
workflow.description: VibeCap understands how vibe coding actually works: You don't want to explain everything. You want to show, then say a few words.
workflow.note: At the moment you're still in context.

items.title: Prompt + image, sent together
points: Image(s) and text go into the editor at the same time

items.title: Editor-friendly by design
points: Works naturally with modern coding tools

pricing.title: Choose Your Plan
pricing.subtitle: Pick the plan that fits how you work.
pricing.description: No accounts. Cancel anytime for subscriptions.
pricing.footnote: No feature differences. Just different ways to pay.

closing.title: Built to remove friction, not add features
closing.description: VibeCap doesn't try to be smart. It tries to be reliable at the exact moment you need it.
closing.highlight: That's what makes vibe coding smoother.
closing.note: And that's why this small tool ends up making a big difference.

footer.description: A screenshot tool built specifically for vibe coding.

meta.title: Privacy Policy — VibeCap
meta.description: VibeCap Privacy Policy - Learn how we protect your data

overview.title: Overview
content: VibeCap is a macOS menu bar application designed to help users capture screenshots and quickly paste them into other applications, such as code editors or chat tools.
**VibeCap does not collect, store, transmit, or share any personal data.**
All operations are performed locally on your device.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.intro: **We do not collect any personal information or usage data.**
items: We do **not** collect text input or prompts
We do **not** use analytics, tracking, or advertising SDKs
We do **not** use cookies or identifiers
dataCollection.footer: VibeCap does not communicate with any external servers.

screenContent.title: Screen Content
screenContent.intro: When you take a screenshot using VibeCap:
items: The captured image exists only in memory on your device
The image is optionally saved **only** to a folder you explicitly choose
The image is pasted directly into the target application you select
screenContent.footer: VibeCap never uploads or transmits screenshots outside your device.

permissions.title: Permissions
permissions.intro: VibeCap requires certain macOS system permissions to function correctly:

screenRecording.title: Screen Recording
screenRecording.description: Used solely to capture the screen area you select when taking a screenshot.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: Used to simulate keyboard actions (such as paste commands) in the target application you choose.

notes: Used only for the described functionality
Never used to monitor user behavior

localStorage.title: Local Storage
localStorage.intro: VibeCap stores limited configuration data locally using macOS system storage, including:
items: App settings such as auto-save and launch-at-login
localStorage.footer: This data never leaves your device.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.intro: VibeCap does not integrate with any third-party services.

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: Because VibeCap does not collect data, **no data is shared with third parties**.

childrenPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.content: VibeCap does not collect any data and is safe for users of all ages.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: If VibeCap's functionality changes in a way that affects privacy, this Privacy Policy will be updated accordingly.
